title: The Top 3 Hotels In Abu Dhabi (Michael Gomes)
text: By Michael Gomes Jul 27, 2015 Whether you are adventurous or a party animal, you have a zest for religion or you simply wish to enjoy the rich cultural, Abu Dhabi is a city where people with different tastes and interests can come along and enjoy their vacation. Large number of tourist from all across the globe visits the emirate throughout the year for a mesmerizing holiday experience. The top tourist destinations in Abu Dhabi are Heritage Village, Khalifa Park, Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Yas Island, Sky tower and more. The city offers everything right from scenic beaches to sand dunes, shopping malls, theme parks, top-notch restaurants and world class accommodation options.You can get a range of hotels here from budget accommodations to the luxurious ones. If you're planning a luxurious getaway to the emirate, here are the top 3 Abu Dhabi hotels that offer unparallel services and outstanding hospitality to their guests round the clock. Radisson Blu Abu Dhabi:An island hotel which is not far away from the airport and the Ferrari World. It's a 4 star property and offers a range of facilities of all international standards. Offering a variety of sports and recreational amenities right from spa, sauna, fitness center and a state-of-the-art golf course which is just 3kms away, a stay here is definitely a worth deal.Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi:Stay here and wake up to a view that mesmerizes you and makes you fall in love all over again. The hotel rooms facing the calm blue waters and greenery all around will simply take your breath away. A relaxing drink on the shacks facing the beach side will soothe your senses. The hotel staff and facilities help you take a back seat and enjoy your vacation to the fullest. Whether you wish to play golf or enjoy a pool side breakfast with your family, this hotel will take care of all your vacation needs. Enjoying a romantic dinner with your loved one with the melodious Arabian music playing along or party with your friends at the beautifully structured bar - this hotel is one of the best accommodations the island has to offer.Yas Viceroy:An exceptionally structured 5 star property that simply leaves you speechless. It's a unique piece of architecture which is just 10 minutes from the airport. It offers 2 rooftop pools and spa. The hotel rooms overlook the Grand Formula 1 circuit. With a friendly staff and world class amenities they leave no stone upturned. The rooms are beautifully designed an equipped with all modern fixtures. The restaurants and bars offer world cuisines offering you an extra-ordinary gastronomy experience. The property is conveniently located and easily accessible from major tourist destinations in the city.Whether you are traveling for business or holiday, a stay at one of these hotels will leave you with an unforgettable experience. A perfect backdrop with world class facilities and services is all that you need for a comfortable stay. Ensure that you check for deals and discounts while booking your accommodation in Abu Dhabi hotels. About the Author
